resourcesDescription: Define the resources that are available in your application.
editColumnDescription: Customize the attributes of this column. Click save when you're done.
displayNameDescription: The name shown in the UI for this column
singleOptionDescription: Only option for this data type
uiDataTypeDescription: How should this field be displayed in the UI?
descriptionDescription: A brief description of what this column represents
visibleDescription: Show this column in the UI
visibleInTableDescription: Show this column in the data table/list view
visibleInDetailDescription: Show this column in the record detail/form view
enableSmartSuggestionsDescription: Show intelligent suggestions based on existing data when editing this field. Useful for frequently repeated fields.
defaultValueDescription: The default value for this column
fileUploadConfigDescription: Configure how files are uploaded to the storage bucket.
storagePathTemplateDescription: Path template for organizing files. Use {timestamp}, {filename}, {extension} as variables. You can also use all the fields from the record as variables if being updated. Ex. {id}.{extension}
storageBucketDescription: The name of the bucket to store the files in
trueLabelDescription: The text to use for the true value
falseLabelDescription: The text to use for the false value
trueLabelDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what the true value represents
falseLabelDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what the false value represents

member.pageDescription: Manage your organization's members and their roles.
member.emailDescription: This is the email address that will be used to contact the member.
member.displayNameDescription: The name shown in the UI for this member
member.accountUpdatedDescription: The account details have been updated successfully.
member.manageRolesDescription: Assign a role to this member. Members can only have one role at a time.
member.youWillAssignRole: You will assign the following role to this member:
member.roleDescription: The role to assign to the member.
member.roleDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this role is for
member.noRolesFoundDescription: There are no roles available to assign to this member.
member.assignRoleDescription: Assign a role to this member. Click save when you're done.
member.roleAssignedDescription: The role has been assigned to the member successfully.
member.roleRemovedDescription: The role has been removed from the member successfully.
member.accountStatusDescription: The status of the member's account.
member.assignedRoleDescription: The role assigned to this member.
member.accountIdDescription: The unique identifier for the member's account.
member.authUserIdDescription: The unique identifier in Supabase Auth
member.activityLogsDescription: The activity logs for the member.
member.noActivityLogs: No activity logs found for this member.
member.recentActivityDescription: The recent activity for the member.
member.elevatingRoleToSameRankDescription: You are elevating the role to the same rank as your own role. Are you sure you want to do this?

table.pageDescription: Define the resources that are available in your application.
table.visibleDescription: Whether the resource is visible in the Data Explorer.
table.isSearchableDescription: Whether the table appears in global search results. Disabling this improves performance by skipping the table from being searchable.
table.displayFormatInvalid: Invalid display format. Please only use the listed fields as variables.
table.errorLoadingResourceDescription: An error occurred while loading the resource. Please try again.
table.displayNameDescription: A human-readable name for the table.
table.descriptionDescription: A short description of the table.
table.displayFormatDescription: The format of the table's display. The accepted variables are: {{values}}
table.displayFormatExample: Define how records from this table should be displayed when referenced elsewhere. You can use the following fields: {{example}}
table.noColumnsFound: No columns found for this table.
table.columnsDescription: This table displays all columns for the {{displayName}} resource.
table.configureTableDescription: Tweak the table's settings to how you prefer it.
table.layoutDesignerDescription: Customize how fields are arranged in the record form for {{table}} in {{schema}}
table.batchEditTablesDescription: Update visibility settings for multiple tables at once.
table.batchEditColumnsDescription: Update visibility settings for multiple columns at once.
table.visibleInTableDescription: Whether the column is visible in the data table/list view.
table.visibleInDetailDescription: Whether the column is visible in the record detail/form view.
table.syncTablesDescription: Synchronize table metadata from your database schema to make them available in Supamode.
table.schemaNameDescription: The name of the database schema to sync.
table.reorderProtection: Table reordering is in progress. Please wait for it to complete before navigating away.

layoutDesigner.title: Layout Designer
layoutDesigner.resetConfirmDescription: This will remove your custom layout and use Supamode's default display algorithm. Your fields will be automatically grouped into Main, System, and Relations sections. This action cannot be undone.
layoutDesigner.displayModeDescription: Layout for viewing records. Hidden fields won't appear.
layoutDesigner.editModeDescription: Layout for editing or creating records. Only editable fields will be shown.
layoutDesigner.displayFieldsDescription: Fields visible in detail view. Hidden fields are dimmed.
layoutDesigner.editFieldsDescription: Fields that can be edited. Read-only fields are dimmed.
layoutDesigner.columnSizeDescription: Choose how much space this column takes up in the row
layoutDesigner.noRowsYet: No rows in your layout yet.
layoutDesigner.getStartedInstructions: Click "Add Row" to get started, then drag columns from the palette.
layoutDesigner.dropColumnsInRow: Drop columns here to add them to this row
layoutDesigner.experimentalFeatureDescription: The Layout Designer is an experimental feature that is currently disabled. To enable it, set the environment variable VITE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_LAYOUT_DESIGNER=true in your development environment.

roles.name: Name
roles.createRoleDescription: Create a new role to group permissions and assign to users.
roles.rankDescription: Higher rank roles have precedence. Maximum allowed by your account is {{maxRank}}.
roles.title: Roles
roles.nameDescription: The name of the role displayed to users.
roles.descriptionPlaceholder: Ex. This role has access to all features
roles.descriptionDescription: A description explaining what this role is for.
roles.assignedPermissionsDescription: Higher rank roles take precedence. The highest rank your account can set is {{maxRank}}.
roles.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.
roles.deleteWarning: Warning: Deleting this role will remove it from all users who currently have it.

permissions.title: Roles and Permissions
permissions.description: Manage roles and permissions for your organization
permissions.throughPermissionGroups: They can still inherit permissions through permission groups.
permissions.assignedPermissionsDescription: Permissions that are currently assigned to this role.
permissions.noPermissionsAssigned: No permissions assigned to this role.
permissions.assignedPermissionGroupsDescription: Permission groups that are currently assigned to this role. This role will inherit the permissions from all the groups below.
permissions.permissionGroupsIncludingThisPermission: Permission groups that include this permission.
permissions.noPermissionGroupsAssigned: No permission groups assigned to this role.
permissions.permissionTypeDescription: Determines whether this is a system or data permission. System permissions regard actions within the system (roles, permissions), while data permissions regard actions on data (tables, columns).
permissions.protectedSchemaActionDescription: This is a protected schema. Only select action is allowed.

systemResourceDescription.default: The system resource this permission applies to
systemResourceDescription.account: This permission is used to manage the Admin accounts and its settings.
systemResourceDescription.role: This permission is used to manage Roles
systemResourceDescription.permission: This permission is used to manage Permissions
systemResourceDescription.log: This permission is used to manage Audit Logs
systemResourceDescription.table: This permission is used to manage Tables
systemResourceDescription.auth_user: This permission is used to manage Auth Users

permissions.scopeDescription: The scope of the permission. This determines what part of the system resource the permission applies to.
permissions.name: Name
permissions.nameDescription: A unique name for this permission.
permissions.descriptionDescription: An optional description of the permission.
permissions.manageRolePermissionsDescription: Add or remove permissions for this role.
permissions.manageRolePermissionGroupsDescription: Add or remove permission groups for this role.
permissions.deletePermissionGroupDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this permission group? This action cannot be undone.
permissions.permissionsInGroupDescription: Permissions that are currently in this group.
permissions.noPermissionsAssignedToGroup: No permissions assigned to this group.
permissions.rolesUsingThisGroupDescription: Roles that have been assigned this permission group.
permissions.noRolesAssignedToGroup: No roles assigned to this group.
permissions.rolesUsingThisPermissionDescription: Roles that are using this permission directly (not through a permission group).
permissions.noRolesUsingThisPermission: No roles are using this permission directly.
permissions.permissionInNoGroups: This permission is not included in any permission groups.
permissions.rolesUsingThisPermissionWarning: Warning: This permission is being used by the following roles:
permissions.groupsUsingThisPermissionWarning: Warning: This permission is being used by the following groups:
permissions.deletePermissionDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this permission? This action cannot be undone.
permissions.createDescription: Add a new permission to your system. Click save when you're done.
permissions.editDescription: Update the permission details. Click save when you're done.
permissions.schemaNameDescription: The database schema this permission applies to
permissions.tableNameDescription: The database table this permission applies to
permissions.columnNameDescription: The database column this permission applies to
permissions.createGroupDescription: Create a new permission group to organize related permissions. Click save when you're done.
permissions.editGroupDescription: Update permission group details. Click save when you're done.
permissions.groupNamePlaceholder: Permission group name. Ex. Content Managers
permissions.groupNameDescription: A unique name for this permission group. For example, 'Content Managers' or 'Sales Team'.
permissions.groupDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this permission group represents
permissions.groupDescriptionDescription: An optional description of the permission group.
permissions.failedToUpdateRolePermissionGroups: Failed to update role permission groups
permissions.manageGroupPermissionsDescription: Add or remove permissions for this group.
permissions.storageBucketPlaceholder: Enter the name of the storage bucket
permissions.storageBucketDescription: The name of the storage bucket to which this permission applies.
permissions.storagePathPatternPlaceholder: Enter the path pattern for this permission
permissions.storagePathPatternDescription: The path pattern for this permission. This is a pattern that will be used to match the path of the file in the storage bucket. Use * for wildcards just like % in SQL. Ex. /users/* matches all files in the /users/ directory.
permissions.groupNameMaxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters
permissions.groupDescriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 1000 characters

errors.nameFormat: Name must start with an uppercase letter and contain only uppercase letters, numbers, and underscores
errors.nameLength: Name must be less than 50 characters
errors.rankMax: The value entered is greater than the maximum allowed rank
errors.protectedSchemaAction: Protected schemas only allow select action

currency.pickCurrencyDescription: Select the currency to use for this column.
currency.pickCurrencyPlaceholder: Click here to select a currency

general.title: General Settings
general.languageDescription: Choose what language you want to display for your account.
general.timezoneDescription: Choose a timezone to convert dates in

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Manage your multi-factor authentication settings and security devices
authentication.mfaFactorsDescription: Add or remove authentication devices to secure your account
authentication.factorsListErrorDescription: There was an error loading your multi-factor authentication factors. Please try again.
authentication.multiFactorAuthDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling multi-factor authentication. You will be prompted for an additional verification code when signing in.
authentication.unenrollFactorModalDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this authentication factor? You will no longer be able to use it to sign in.
authentication.verifyActivationCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
authentication.qrCodeErrorDescription: There was an error generating the QR code. Please try again.
authentication.multiFactorModalHeading: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
authentication.factorNameHint: Enter a name to help you identify this factor
authentication.multiFactorSetupErrorDescription: There was an error setting up multi-factor authentication. Please try again.

mfa.title: Require Multi-Factor Authentication for Admin Access
mfa.description: When enabled, all users must set up multi-factor authentication to access the Admin application. It's recommended to enable this.
mfa.enabledDescription: Enable multi-factor authentication for your account.
mfa.disabledDescription: Disable multi-factor authentication for your account.
mfa.verifyYourAccount: You must first enable MFA on your account to enforce it for all users.

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: View and filter audit logs for your organization

replaceExistingDescription: Replace existing data with the new data. This will overwrite all existing data with the new data.
allowedFileTypesDescription: The file types that are allowed to be uploaded. This is a comma separated list of file types. Ex. image/jpeg,image/png,application/pdf. You can use * as a wildcard, such as image/* or application/*.
maxFileSizeDescription: The maximum file size that can be uploaded. This is in megabytes. Please also set the same value in the Supabase storage configuration.
nonEditableWarning: This column is required and has no default value. Making it non-editable will prevent new records from being created.
